fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Lookout for other Ghosts
- Speak to a living player during the night (Day ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use the first ability while alive, you make Ghosts' visits on that player Astral that night
- You may use the second ability while dead
- You appear as a Medium seance
- Astral Ghost visits are not seen by Spy
- You may roleblock the player you seance, but you cannot use your roleblocking ability on consecutive nights
